/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life and constant movement. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene, enhancing the colors and details of the image.
